[\[302a.1\]]gtam la sogs pa'i bar chad thams cad dang bral ba dang myur ba dang ngal ba dang mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa dang 'khrugs pa dang lhag pa dang chad pa dang nga ro ngan pa spangs te/_/ngag snyan pos brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod par bya'o/_/bden pa
[\[302a.2\]]de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad dag cing bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad bsal bar bsam par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan dang bcas pa bdag gi spyi bo nas snying gar zhugs te dgyes
[\[302a.3\]]shing 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang ldan pas skyil krung gis bzhugs par bsams la de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad skye ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag dang bral ba dang /_skye ba gzhan du bde ba khyad par can dang ldan pa dang byang chub myur du thob par bya
[\[302a.4\]]ba'i dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas legs par bsngos la rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa yang lan gsum la sogs pa ci rigs su dal gyis bklags nas ldang bar bya'o/_/de ltar sku la dmigs pa gsum kho na ste/_byang chub sems
[\[302a.5\]]dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud chen po las/_/gtso bo shAkya seng ge'i sku/_/'od zer 'bum phrag mtha' yas can/_/mtshan dang dpe byad rab rgyas la/_/'dren pa 'gro ba'i mgon gcig pu/_/khams dang dbang po'i bye brag gis/_/mdzad pa'i rnam pa tha dad par/_/
[\[302a.6\]]gdul bya'i don du rab tu snang /_/bdag gis gang mos de dang der/_/dmigs te sngags brjod mthu yis ni/_/'gro ba'i nad sel sman pa che/_/tshe 'phel longs spyod rab tu 'phel/_/dbul phongs mya ngan 'jigs pa med/_/zhing khams thams cad rab sbyong zhing /_/'gro
[\[302a.7\]]ba'i don la rab brtson pa/_/ded dpon chen po skyabs kyi mchog_/rab grags sku ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de ltar sngags kyi sbyor ba'i gzungs sngags su sgrub pa'i phyogs brjod nas/_da ni rigs sngags su sgrub pa'i phyogs brjod
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]par bya'o/_/'di yang sngags dang phyag rgya dang sku la dmigs pa ste/_de dag dbang po'i bye brag gis gsum gsum brjod par bya'o/_/de yang sngags la dmigs pa ni khrus dang gtsang sbra dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba sngon ltar byas nas snying gar thal
[\[302b.2\]]mo sbyar nas sngags tshar gcig brjod nas bdag gi snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig dkar po sngags kyis bskor ba bsams la/_phreng ba blangs la bdun la sogs pa brjod pa'i tshe hUM yig gi 'od kyis bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa dag par bsam mo/_/g.yeng
[\[302b.3\]]ba la sogs pa'i skyon ni rnam pa bcu gcig dang bral bas snyan pa'i sgras bklag par bya'o/_/brjod pa de'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad gzungs kyi phreng ba 'di kho na dang bdag la yang dag par bsams la de las byung ba'i dge bas bdag sdug bsngal thams cad dang
[\[302b.4\]]bral bar bya ba'i smon lam sh+lo ka gcig la sogs pas bsngo bar bya'o/_/yang na dang por khrus dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang 'gro ba la tshad med pa bsgom pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba byas nas snying ga dang mgrin par thal mo sbyar
[\[302b.5\]]bar byas nas tshar re re brjod de/_phreng ba blangs nas bdag gi snying ga dang mgrin par pad+ma dang zla ba la hUM yig dkar po sngags kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa bsams nas brjod pa'i tshe sngags kyi 'od kyis bdag dang khams gsum pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam mo/_/de ltar g.yeng ba
[\[302b.6\]]la sogs pa'i skyon bcu gcig dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs par bklags nas de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi bsam pa'i rgyud 'gro ba tshim pa'i chos kyi char chen po'i gzhir gyur par bsams la/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bsngo ba sh+lo ka gnyis
[\[302b.7\]]la sogs pa smon lam yang btab nas ldang bar bya'o/_/yang na dang po khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan pas tshad med pa bzhis 'gro ba la bltas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sdom pa bzung nas gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar zhing brjod nas bdag gi gnas
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gsum du pad+ma dang zla ba la hUM yig dkar po sngags phreng gis bskor ba la dmigs te/_g.yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon bcu gcig dang bral zhing snyan pa'i ngag [(]kyis [,]gis [)]brjod de/_sngags kyi 'od zer kha dog lnga'i tshul du 'phro bas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i nad dang gnod
[\[303a.2\]]pa dang nyon mongs pa lnga la sogs pa zad par byas par bsam zhing rgyun ni 'chad pa'am brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa bklag par bya'o/_/de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag gi lus sgyu ma lta bur gyur nas sngags kyi rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/_bdag dang sems can thams cad nad dang
[\[303a.3\]]gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_skye ba thams cad du gnod pa med cing bde ba dang byang chub thob par bya ba'i don du dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas bsngo bar bya'o/_/de ltar de dag ni rig sngags yi ge'i tshul du 'don pa ste sgrib pa thams cad rnam
[\[303a.4\]]par sel pa'i rgyud las/_/rig sngags yi ge'i ngo bo nyid/_/khams dang dbang po'i bye brag gis/_/tha dad du mar gnas mod kyang /_/don ni sngags kyi rang bzhin dngos/_/gang gis de shes 'don pa la/_/tshe 'dir gnod pa kun bral nas/_/bde ba'i rgyu dang ma bral bar/_/
[\[303a.5\]]bde ba can du myur du skye/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/yang na rig sngags phyag rgya'i tshul du brjod na khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra dang /_tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_sdom
[\[303a.6\]]pa gzung ba la sogs pa sngon ltar byas snying gar thal mo sbyar nas sngags brjod de/_bdag gi snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa as mtshan pa sngags kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa dmigs te/_g.yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon bcu gcig dang bral bas
[\[303a.7\]]bdun la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod pa'i tshe rdo rje sngags dang bcas pa de'i 'od zer gyis bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo dag par byas shing de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas dge ba'i smon lam sh+lo ka gcig la sogs pa brjod
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]nas ci rigs par ldang bar bya'o/_/yang na khrus dang gtsang sbra dang tshad med pa bsgom pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba sngon ltar byas nas/_snying ga dang mgrin par rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sngags brjod pas bdag gi snying ga dang mgrin par pad+ma
[\[303b.2\]]dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa aM yig la sngags phreng gis bskor ba dang bcas pa dmigs la/_g.yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs su brjod pa'i tshe rdo rje dang sngags kyi 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi
[\[303b.3\]]sdig pa'i tshogs sbyongs shing ji srid 'khor ba'i skye rga na 'chi'i chu bo 'joms par byed cing rdo rje'i lus su gyur nas bstan pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad sdig pa thams cad zad pa la sogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i smon

[\[329b.6\]]dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma thob pa ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro zhes pa nas/_mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar ni phan yon yin no/_/bsnyen pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[329b.7\]]grangs med dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba nas dgyes par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ni phan yon yin no/_/bsnyen pa dang dkyil 'khor la stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba zhes bya ba nas sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ma lus
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]par byang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du phan yon bstan to/_/gzhan yang gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang mchod pa dang sbyin pa dang nyan pa dang klog pa dang len pa dang 'chang ba dang kha ton byed pa dang de sems pa dang bsgom pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[330a.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la la zhes bya ba nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ni phan yon yin no/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te sta gon gyi rim gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la spyan phye nas/_grong ngam grong rdal
[\[330a.3\]]la sogs par btsugs na mi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_yams kyi nad dang zhes bya ba nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du phan yon yin no/_/nye bar 'tshe ba dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang /_'jigs pa brgyad dang /_sdug bsngal brgyad byung ba de'i tshe sngar
[\[330a.4\]]bstan pa'i tshogs bsags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas nas lan gsum bzlas na de thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nye ba'i snying po'i 'khor lo ras la bris nas sngags lan gsum bzlas na yang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhung gi don bshad zin to/_/rjes su yi rang
[\[330a.5\]]zhing bstod pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor gyis rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa'o/_/gtsug tor gdugs dkar mchog
[\[330a.6\]]grub gzungs/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa la/_/lag na rdo rjes rab bsdus pa/_/brgyud pa'i rim pa bla mas bshad/_/thos nas gdams ngag bris pa las/_/bdag gis dge ba ci bsags pa/_/de yis sems can thams cad ni/_/rnam snang mdzad chen grags chen shog_/
[\[330a.7\]]'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa chen mo zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon shU raM ga warma badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur//_//
